StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateHighSchoolPlanFromScheduledEvent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolPro.leID uniqueiden..er, @PlanType int, @ActualDate date.me, @LastUpdatedBy uniqueiden..er
AS BEGIN
-- STEP 1: Start the transac.on BEGIN TRANSACTION
DECLARE @Plan_Type varchar(3) DECLARE @SchoolCode int DECLARE @SchoolYear int
SET @Plan_Type = CASE @PlanType WHEN 132 THEN 'INV' WHEN 144 THEN 'JRL' WHEN 143 THEN 'SRL' WHEN 139 THEN 'SNT' WHEN 140 THEN 'JNT' WHEN 141 THEN 'BAT' WHEN 142 THEN 'CAT' --WHEN 178 THEN '1SR' END
SELECT @SchoolCode = SCHOOL_CODE, @SchoolYear = SCHOOL_YEAR FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE WHERE rowguid = @SchoolPro.leID
-- STEP 2 & 3: IF EXISTS(SELECT SCHOOL_CODE FROM Mcriss.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = @Plan_Type AND SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear) BEGIN -- if already exists. UPDATE.
DECLARE @Exis.ngDate date.me
SELECT @Exis.ngDate = ACTUAL_MONTH FROM Mcriss.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = @Plan_Type AND SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear
IF @Exis.ngDate IS NULL OR (@Exis.ngDate IS NOT NULL AND @Exis.ngDate > @ActualDate) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN SET ACTUAL_MONTH = @ActualDate ,USER_LOGIN = @LastUpdatedBy ,UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE PLAN_TYPE = @Plan_Type AND SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear END
END ELSE BEGIN -- if does not exist. INSERT. INSERT INTO MCRISS.[dbo].[HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN] ([PLAN_TYPE] ,[SCHOOL_CODE] ,[SCHOOL_YEAR] ,[PLANNED_MONTH] ,[ACTUAL_MONTH] ,[COMMENTS] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid]) VALUES (@Plan_Type ,@SchoolCode ,@SchoolYear ,NULL ,@ActualDate ,NULL ,@LastUpdatedBy ,GETDATE() ,NEWID())
END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- STEP 4: If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully -- Commit the transac.on.... COMMIT TRANSACTION
END
